FactSheet.Title: PRIME FACT SHEET
FactSheet.SubTitle: One Premium Golf Membership Across Thailand
FactSheet.Intro: PRIME Corporate Golf Membership provides organizations with flexible, convenient access to 70+ premium golf courses throughout Thailand. With dedicated Personal Concierge service and 144 annual rounds, PRIME simplifies corporate golf entertainment.
FactSheet.Highlight1: 144 Annual Rounds - Generous allocation for corporate entertainment needs.
FactSheet.Highlight2: 70+ Premium Courses - Championship venues to exclusive private clubs.
FactSheet.Highlight3: 2 Corporate Users - Two registered users per membership.
FactSheet.Highlight4: Personal Concierge - Dedicated service team handles all arrangements.
FactSheet.Highlight5: Personal Concierge - Dedicated service team handles all arrangements.
FactSheet.Highlight6: All-Inclusive - Green fees, caddies, and carts included every round.
FactSheet.FlexibilityDesc: Play at different courses for different occasions.
FactSheet.PredictableCostsDesc: Fixed annual fee eliminates surprise costs.
FactSheet.Step3Desc: Focus on your game and guests
Terms.Title: TERMS & CONDITIONS
Terms.DetailFeeValue: ฿949,000 (VAT excluded) / (including 7% VAT). This is a fixed annual fee for a 12-month membership term.
Terms.DetailRoundsValue: 144 rounds of golf annually. Includes green fee, caddy, and golf cart for all rounds. Limited to one 18-hole round per day, per player.
Terms.DetailUsersValue: Each corporate membership includes 2 primary registered users from the member corporation.
Terms.DetailGuestsValue: Each registered user may bring up to 3 guests. A maximum of 6 guests are permitted when both registered users are present.
Terms.DetailServicesValue: ฿10,000 per user change. The new user must be an employee or director of the same member corporation. Membership itself is corporate-specific and non-transferable to other companies.
Terms.DetailCancellationValue: Deduction of 1 round from the annual quota for cancellations made less than 48 hours in advance or for no-shows.
Terms.Fees.Title: Membership Fees & Features
Terms.Fees.Description: All fees are subject to applicable taxes and must be paid in full prior to membership activation.
Terms.Section1.Title: 1. Membership Details
Terms.Section1.Content1: Your PRIME Corporate Golf Membership is subject to the following terms:
Terms.Section1.Content2: Membership Term: The membership is effective for 12 months from the activation date (March 1, 2026).
Terms.Section1.Content3: Registered Users: Each corporate membership allows two (2) named primary users. These individuals must be personnel of the member company.
Terms.Section1.Content4: Transferability: The membership is corporate-specific and non-transferable to other companies. Named users may be changed within the same member company. A fee of ฿10,000 applies to each user change.
Terms.Section1.Content5: Renewal: The membership renews automatically for successive 12-month periods unless either party provides written notice of non-renewal at least 60 days before the end of the current term.
Terms.Section2.Title: 2. Usage and Guest Policy
Terms.Section2.Content1: To ensure a premium experience for all members, please follow these usage policies:
Terms.Section2.Content2: Annual Quota: Play is limited to a maximum of 144 rounds per year per membership. Unused rounds do not carry over to the next year.
Terms.Section2.Content3: Daily Limit: Play is limited to 1 round (18 holes) per day for each registered user or guest.
Terms.Section2.Content4: Guest Accompaniment: Registered members must accompany their guests at all times during play on the course.
Terms.Section2.Content5: Group Size: A single registered member may host up to 3 guests (total group of 4). Both registered members together may host up to 6 guests (total group of 8).
Terms.Section3.Title: 3. Booking and Cancellation Policy
Terms.Section3.Content1: All tee times must be managed through your Personal Concierge. The following policies apply:
Terms.Section3.Content2: Booking Process: Contact your Personal Concierge to arrange all bookings. For some premium courses, bookings should be made at least 14 days in advance where possible.
Terms.Section3.Content3: Course Availability: If the member's first-choice course is unavailable, the Personal Concierge will offer alternative tee times at other available courses in the network. Members may accept the alternative or cancel without penalty.
Terms.Section3.Content4: Cancellation Notice: To cancel or modify a booking without penalty, you must notify your Personal Concierge at least 48 hours before the scheduled tee time.
Terms.Section3.Content5: Late Cancellation/No-Show Penalty: Cancellations made less than 48 hours before the scheduled time, or failure to appear for a booking (no-show), will result in the deduction of one (1) round from your annual quota for each player booked.
Terms.Section4.Title: 4. Conduct and Responsibility
Terms.Section4.Content1: Members and guests are expected to maintain the highest standards of etiquette.
Terms.Section4.Content2: Course Rules: All members and guests must strictly adhere to the rules, regulations, and etiquette of each golf course, including dress codes and pace of play.
Terms.Section4.Content3: Liability: PRIME Corporate Golf Membership is not responsible for personal injury or property damage occurring at any partner golf course facilities.
Agreement.Title: MEMBERSHIP AGREEMENT
Agreement.Intro: This Membership Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into between PRIME Corporate Golf Membership ("Prime Golf Club"), and the undersigned Corporate Member ("the Member").
Agreement.Section1.Title: MEMBERSHIP SERVICES & PRIVILEGES
Agreement.Section1.Content1: Annual Golf Rounds: A total of one hundred and forty-four (144) rounds of golf annually at partner courses across Thailand.
Agreement.Section1.Content2: Registered Users: Access for two (2) Designated Users from the Member's organization.
Agreement.Section1.Content3: Included Services: Each round includes green fee, caddy, and golf cart.
Agreement.Section1.Content4: Course Network: Access to 70+ partner golf courses throughout Thailand.
Agreement.Section1.Content5: Personal Concierge Service: Access to Prime Golf Club Personal Concierge service for booking and coordination.
Agreement.Section1.Content6: Digital Membership Management: Access to digital membership management tools (when available).
Agreement.Section1.Content7: All services are subject to the terms outlined in the "Pricing & Terms" document and this Agreement.
Agreement.Section2.Title: MEMBERSHIP TERM & RENEWAL
Agreement.Section2.Content1: 2.1. Effective Date: This Agreement becomes effective on March 1, 2026, or the date specified in the membership activation notice ("Effective Date").
Agreement.Section2.Content2: 2.2. Term: This Agreement is effective for twelve (12) months from the Effective Date ("Initial Term").
Agreement.Section2.Content3: 2.3. Renewal: This Agreement shall automatically renew for successive twelve (12) month periods unless either party provides written notice of non-renewal at least sixty (60) days prior to the end of the current term.
Agreement.Section3.Title: FEES & PAYMENT
Agreement.Section3.Content1: 3.1. Annual Fee: The Member agrees to pay the annual membership fee of ฿949,000 (excluding VAT), or ฿1,015,430 (including 7% VAT), plus any other applicable taxes.
Agreement.Section3.Content2: 3.2. Payment Terms: The annual fee is due in full at least thirty (30) days prior to the Effective Date or renewal date.
Agreement.Section3.Content3: 3.3. Late Payment: Late payments will incur a fee of 1.5% per month. Membership privileges may be suspended for accounts over 30 days in arrears.
Agreement.Section4.Title: TRANSFERABILITY & USER CHANGES
Agreement.Section4.Content1: 4.1. Non-Transferability: This membership is corporate-specific and non-transferable to other companies or legal entities. The Member may not sell, assign, or otherwise transfer this membership to any other organization.
Agreement.Section4.Content2: 4.2. User Changes: The Member may change Designated Users (named individuals authorized to use the membership) at any time, subject to a fee of ฿10,000 per user change. New Designated Users must be employees or directors of the Member corporation.
Agreement.Section5.Title: BOOKING, GUEST, & CANCELLATION POLICIES
Agreement.Section5.Content1: 5.1. Guest Policy: Designated Users must be present with their guests during play. The Member is responsible for the conduct of its Designated Users and guests.
Agreement.Section5.Content2: 5.2. Guest Limits: Each Designated User may bring up to 3 guests. Maximum of 6 guests when both Designated Users are present.
Agreement.Section5.Content3: 5.3. Cancellation Policy: Cancellations must be made at least 48 hours in advance through the Personal Concierge. Late cancellations or "No-shows" will result in the forfeiture of the corresponding golf rounds from the annual quota.
Agreement.Section5.Content4: 5.4. Annual Quota: The 144-round annual quota is for the membership term only. Unused rounds do not roll over to subsequent membership years.
Agreement.Section6.Title: LIABILITY & INDEMNIFICATION
Agreement.Section6.Content1: 6.1. Assumption of Risk: All Designated Users and guests use golf facilities at their own risk. Golf is an outdoor activity with inherent risks.
Agreement.Section6.Content2: 6.2. Limitation of Liability: Prime Golf Club is not liable for personal injury, property damage, or loss that occurs at partner golf course facilities.
Agreement.Section6.Content3: 6.3. Indemnification: The Member agrees to indemnify and hold harmless Prime Golf Club from any claims, damages, or liabilities arising from the actions or conduct of its Designated Users or guests.
Agreement.Section7.Title: CONFIDENTIALITY
Agreement.Section7.Content1: Both parties agree to maintain the confidentiality of the terms of this Agreement and any proprietary business information shared during the membership period.
Agreement.Section8.Title: TERMINATION
Agreement.Section8.Content1: 8.1. Termination by Prime Golf Club: Prime Golf Club may terminate this Agreement immediately for: (a) non-payment of fees, (b) material breach of membership terms, or (c) conduct detrimental to Prime Golf Club or its partner courses.
Agreement.Section8.Content2: 8.2. Termination by Member: The Member may terminate this Agreement by providing written notice at the end of any membership term in accordance with Section 2.3 (Renewal). Early termination during a membership term is not permitted except by mutual agreement.
Agreement.Section8.Content3: 8.3. Effect of Termination: Upon termination for breach by the Member, no portion of the annual fee will be refunded. All outstanding fees remain due and payable.
Agreement.Section9.Title: DISPUTE RESOLUTION
Agreement.Section9.Content1: 9.1. Governing Law: This Agreement is governed by the laws of the Kingdom of Thailand.
Agreement.Section9.Content2: 9.2. Arbitration: Any disputes arising from this Agreement shall be settled by binding arbitration in Bangkok, Thailand. The parties shall mutually agree on an arbitrator or arbitration body. Costs of arbitration shall be borne equally by both parties unless otherwise determined by the arbitrator.
Agreement.Section10.Title: GENERAL PROVISIONS
Agreement.Section10.Content1: 10.1. Entire Agreement: This Agreement, together with the Pricing & Terms document, constitutes the entire agreement between the parties regarding Prime Corporate Golf membership.
Agreement.Section10.Content2: 10.2. Amendments: Prime Golf Club may modify these terms with 30 days written notice to the Member. Material changes to pricing or core benefits require Member consent or right to terminate without penalty.
Agreement.Section10.Content3: 10.3. Notices: All notices shall be sent to the addresses provided by each party in writing or via email to registered contact addresses.
Agreement.Name: Name:
Privacy.Title: PRIVACY POLICY
Privacy.Intro:
Prime Corporate Golf ("PRIME", "we", "us", or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.

By accessing or using our services, you agree to this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use our services.
Privacy.Section1.Title: 1. Information We Collect
Privacy.Section1.Content1: We may collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you apply for membership, register designated users, contact our Personal Concierge service, communicate with us via email, phone, or LINE, or request information about our services.
Privacy.Section1.Subtitle1: 1.1 Personal Information — This information may include:
Privacy.Section1.Item1: Full name, business title, and company name
Privacy.Section1.Item5: Golf course preferences and booking history
Privacy.Section1.Item6: 1.2 Automatically Collected Information: IP address, browser type, device information, operating system, pages visited, time spent, referral source, and clickstream data
Privacy.Section1.Content2: When you visit our website, we may automatically collect certain information about your device and usage patterns.
Privacy.Section2.Title: 2. How We Use Your Information
Privacy.Section2.Content1: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
Privacy.Section2.Item1: Membership Management: Processing applications, managing memberships, and maintaining user records
Privacy.Section2.Item2: Service Delivery: Coordinating tee time bookings, arranging golf course access, and providing Personal Concierge services
Privacy.Section2.Item3: Communication: Responding to inquiries, sending booking confirmations, and providing membership updates; Billing and Payments: Processing membership fees and managing financial transactions
Privacy.Section2.Item4: Service Improvement: Analyzing usage patterns to enhance our course network and service quality; Legal Compliance: Fulfilling our legal obligations and enforcing our terms and conditions
Privacy.Section3.Title: 3. Information Sharing and Disclosure
Privacy.Section3.Content1: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:
Privacy.Section3.Item1: Golf Course Partners: We share necessary booking information with our partner golf courses to facilitate your reservations
Privacy.Section3.Item2: Service Providers: We may engage third-party companies to perform services on our behalf (e.g., payment processing, data analytics)
Privacy.Section3.Item3: Legal Requirements: We may disclose information if required by law or in response to valid legal requests
Privacy.Section3.Content2: Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred to the acquiring entity.
Privacy.Section4.Title: 4. Data Security
Privacy.Section4.Content1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your information, we cannot guarantee absolute security.
Privacy.Section5.Title: 5. Data Retention
Privacy.Section5.Content1: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. When your membership ends, we will retain certain information for record-keeping and legal compliance purposes.
Privacy.Section6.Title: 6. Your Rights
Privacy.Section6.Content1: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:
Privacy.Section6.Item1: Access: Request access to the personal information we hold about you
Privacy.Section6.Item2: Correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information
Privacy.Section6.Item3: Deletion: Request deletion of your personal information, subject to legal obligations
Privacy.Section6.Item4: Restriction: Request restriction of processing in certain circumstances
Privacy.Section6.Item5: Objection: Object to processing of your personal information for certain purposes
Privacy.Section6.Item6: Data Portability: Request transfer of your information to another service provider
Privacy.Section7.Title: 7. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
Privacy.Section7.Content1: Our website uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience. We use Essential Cookies (required for basic website functionality) and Analytics Cookies (help us understand how visitors interact with our website, e.g., Vercel Analytics).
Privacy.Section7.Content2: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Disabling certain cookies may affect website functionality.
Privacy.Section8.Title: 8. Third-Party Links
Privacy.Section8.Content1: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these external sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party websites you visit.
Privacy.Section9.Title: 9. Children's Privacy
Privacy.Section9.Content1: Our services are designed for corporate clients and are not directed to individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.
Privacy.Section10.Title: 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy
Privacy.Section10.Content1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Effective Date" at the top. Continued use of our services after such changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
Privacy.Section11.Title: 11. Contact Information
Privacy.Section11.Content1: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or how we handle your personal information, please contact us using the details below:
CourseDirectory.Title: COURSE DIRECTORY
CourseDirectory.QualityCoursesDesc: Excellent facilities, well-maintained for regular play
CourseDirectory.AboutNetworkDesc: The PRIME Course Network provides members with convenient access to quality golf courses throughout Thailand. Our network includes internationally recognized and premium local courses.
CourseDirectory.Feature1: Premium access to 77+ golf courses across Thailand
CourseDirectory.Feature2: Clubs selected based on course quality, location, and facilities
CourseDirectory.Feature4: Discounted green fees and special promotions
CourseDirectory.Feature5: Course availability is subject to booking policies and seasonal restrictions
CourseDirectory.ContactInfo: Contact Club Relations for more information:
